General.Name: Rimo International Lestari Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Rimo International Lestari Tbk engages in the development of real estate properties in Jakarta, Indonesia. It also operates department stores; provides rental and hospitality services; and is involved in general commerce activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Mayapada Tower II, South Jakarta, Indonesia, 12920
